original_title: New York Mets All Amazin' Team: 40th Anniversary
overview: The New York Mets' 40th Anniversary Celebration was one of the highlights of the 2002 baseball season.  As part of that season-long celebration, fans were invited to vote for an All-Amazin' Team of their favorite Mets, by position.  On Saturday August 17, 2002, the Mets 40th Anniversary All-Amazin' Team was introduced during a special pre-game ceremony.  That ceremony is captured on this limited edition home video, along with career highlights and interviews from many of the baseball greats who were honored by the fans that day at Shea.
title: New York Mets All Amazin' Team: 40th Anniversary
